content: kids love to wear the trendy kids fur vest it s warm soft and provides them with a fun sensory experience everytime they wear it it s a quick crochet vest pattern that is made in one piece and has only 2 seams to sew together at the end available in the following sizes \- 12 months\* \- 18 months\* \- size 2 \- size 4 \- size 6 \- size 8 \- size 10\* \*sizes marked with an asterisk are available only in the pdf version of the pattern all other sizes are available free with ads on my blog \*size measurements given in listing images please note that this is the ad-free pdf version of a pattern that is available for free on the on my blog however this ad-free pdf also \ available on etsy\ \ 1\ includes 3 additional sizes that are not available on the blog when you purchase this pattern you will receive two separate files to download - the toddler sized pattern and the pattern written in sizes 2 - 10 **supplies ** 10 0 mm n/p-15 crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge we crochet fable fur in paloma 100% polyester 71 yds / 70 m 100 g / 3 53 oz approximately 2 - 4 skeins needed depending on size tapestry needle scissors tape measure follow me on social media to see behind the scenes of new upcoming designs and giveaways **instagram ** www instagram com/theloopylamb **facebook ** www facebook com/theloopylamb pinterest www pinterest com/theloopylamb **youtube ** \ check out my youtube channel\ \ 2\ **blog ** www theloopylamb com **disclaimer ** feel free to sell the item created by this pattern but please provide pattern credit back to me when posting online and please provide a link to my blog http //www theloopylamb com http //www theloopylamb com please do not resell distribute duplicate or share this pattern in any printed or digital form or claim this pattern as your own original design please do not use my photos when selling your finished items please note that due to the nature of digital downloads i do not offer refunds on the purchase of digital downloads if you have any questions at all about the pattern please feel free to send me a message through ravelry or via email ashley@theloopylamb com \ 1\ https //www etsy com/ca/theloopylamb/listing/1185347313/crochet-pattern-trendy-kids-fur-vest utm\_source=copy&utm\_medium=listingmanager&utm\_campaign=share&utm\_term=so lmsm&share\_time=1645742258973 https //www etsy com/ca/theloopylamb/listing/1185347313/crochet-pattern-trendy-kids-fur-vest utm\_source=copy&utm\_medium=listingmanager&utm\_campaign=share&utm\_term=so lmsm&share\_time=1645742258973 \ 2\ https //www youtube com/channel/ucd4hdqudbfqqbbgm-bo7myg https //www youtube com/channel/ucd4hdqudbfqqbbgm-bo7myg
